bibl.title: P. Lips. inv. 250 and 260. Two 10th/11th-Century Coptic Texts.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Edition of two late Coptic documentary texts, both of which indicate Coptic-Arabic language contact. - 1. P. Lips. Inv. 250 [paper]: List(s) of items relating to a journey (?) and unrelated (?) account(s). Fayyûm, 10th/11th cent. - 2. P. Lips. Inv. 260 [paper]: Private letter in non-standard late Fayyûmic. Fayyûm, 10th/11th cent. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Tonio Sebastian Richter, P. Lips. inv. 250 and 260. Two 10th/11th-Century Coptic Texts.

Edition of two late Coptic documentary texts, both of which indicate Coptic-Arabic language contact. - 1. P. Lips. Inv. 250 [paper]: List(s) of items relating to a journey (?) and unrelated (?) account(s). Fayyûm, 10th/11th cent. - 2. P. Lips. Inv. 260 [paper]: Private letter in non-standard late Fayyûmic. Fayyûm, 10th/11th cent. - Avec résumé en anglais.
